Specials
Rajbhog Jackson Heights wishes you a Happy and Healthy Holiday Season. Inquire about our Holiday Catering and Platters for your next event. Since the late 70's Rajbhog has been serving the local Indian community as well as the New Yokers. Rajbhog is a pure vegetarian KOSHER fast food restaurant. Rajbhog also serves vegan food as well as Jain food. In order to accomadate everyones timings we are now open till 12am everyday.
Jackson Heights NY Rajbhog Sweets and Snacks 72-27 37th Avenue Jackson Heights,NY, USA
Phone 718-458-8512 Fax Contact Nirav Shah
